levels.description: Immediately drags up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> targets in a large frontal area towards this unit <@ba.vup>slightly</>, dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> <@ba.vup>True damage</> and <$ba.stun>Stunning</> them for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds
